content: Lots of github CI testing runs seem to be failing at the moment with timeouts in ring_theory.derivation (examples: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/actions/runs/4198173497 or https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/actions/runs/4199207353/attempts/1).
I might be responsible for the timeout with my new docs#ideal.idem_comm_semiring instance, which makes unification slightly less good in one or two places.
:ping_pong:, the last bors batch failed due to this timeout
Eric Wieser has marked this topic as resolved.
